title: NEED PEOPLE FOR RANKED 5's! ADD ME FOR 100% GUARANTEED PLAY!
body: I play ranked 5's every day at least 3 or 4 games- I make new teams almost everyday and invite everyone on my friends list. Add  burstfire301 (me, obviously) and at about 5-10AEST every day il invite you! But i only take the first 4 people that get there! So be online and be ready to fill and if you play with me enough and i like you il add you to my main team! Message me ingame (i dont check boards much) and have a nice day :D

So be online and be ready to fill and if you play with me enough and i like you il add you to my main team! Message me ingame (i dont check boards much) and have a nice day :D
